sentence: Our rooms were clean comfortable and quiet only thing that would have been appreciated is 2 queen beds instead of 2 double beds
Our room had a view of Lake Monona
Hotel is in a good location bed was super comfortable and I had a great view of Lake Monona from my room
Great location near the farmers market with nice views of Lake Monona
Good room and great view but service needs work
This hotel has very comfortable rooms and I recommend everyone book a room for a wonderful nights sleep
There are great views of the capital and the lake from many of the rooms
Great place wonderful views
The hotel is located two blocks from the Capitol and it offers great views of downtown
I got to check out the lower hotel lobby bar area and the walkway to the Monona Terrace Convention and Community Center a Frank Loyd Wright designed building on the waterfront of Monona Lake

Hot tub and pool seemed to have high chlorine especially the hot tub also very small pool
Got a room right next to the elevators and was concerned with the noise as it was almost at fill capacity but actually did not even hear anyone throughout the night
Other rooms in the hotel overlooked the State Capitol
First we have a lakeside room which would be wonderful if we were able to open the windows to get some air — it ’s 70 degrees outside and breezy
